name: tensely
content:
tensely adverb
(NERVOUSLY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a worried or nervous way: They all waited tensely for the verdict.
More examplesFewer examplesThe tenants had refused to pay their rent and were tensely waiting for something nasty to happen. Tensely they waited, expecting to be discovered at any moment.Both sides tensely watched the totals in a painfully close vote.Nursing homes wait tensely for flu vaccine.
